name: Honke Sankyo Fever 2: Jikki Simulation
overview: Honke Sankyo Fever Jikki Simulation 2 ("Sankyo Fever Original Machine Simulation 2") is a 1995 pachinko game for the Super Famicom and the follow up to Honke Sankyo Fever Jikki Simulation, released earlier the same year. Like its predecessor, the game features a number of simulations of real-life pachinko machines that the player can practice on and study to prepare them for the real thing. These machines were produced by Sankyo, a manufacturer of pachinko machines in Japan, and the game is named for them.
